title: Nexus Blitz Gamemode
body:
So, I think it would be cool to implement another mini-game for Nexus Blitz where it is a Battle Royale, but every champion reverts back to their original released champion. So their original first released abilities/kit and skin before any re-work. (Or just their abilities/kit).

I.E. Sion, The Undead Champion and is old Stun Q Stunning Gaze, Permanent Toggle Health on is E, Etc.

replies.body: Recreating all those old kits would be a huge amount of work, and the result would be a bunch of imbalanced nonsense (like release Xin Zhao).
